text: Carolina Verónica Mestrovic Moroni (born 20 July 1991, in Arica) is a Chilean singer, actress and television presenter. == Filmografía == === Programas de televisión === ==== Participante ==== Year Title Channel 2008 Rojo, El valor del talent Televisión Nacional de Chile 2008—2011 Yingo Chilevisión 2012 Fiebre de Baile: Famosos en peligro Chilevisión ==== Hostess ==== Year Title Channel 2012 Yingo Chilevisión El Rey del Show Chilevisión 2013 54º Festival de Viña del Mar Chilevisión === Telenovelas === Year Title Role Channel 2010 Amor Virtual Trinidad Ferreira Chilevisión 2010 Don diablo Malena Malebrán Chilevisión 2012 Gordis Linda Sepúlveda Chilevisión 2013 Graduados Sofía Matic Chilevisión == References == == Other websites == * Category:1991 births Category:People from Arica Category:Living people Category:Chilean singers Category:Chilean television actors Category:Chilean television presenters
title: Carolina Mestrovic
